ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Making platinum?
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe that s part of my problem. Whenever I get something, I just sell it to a merchant for a fraction of what they sell it to players for. Is it better to try
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe that's part of my problem. Whenever I get something, I just sell it to
a merchant for a fraction of what they sell it to players for. Is it better
to try to gather needed items like that and try to sell it to players? (I've
yet to do this.)

Chris

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean O'Connor [mailto:Skiman1369@...]
Sent: Friday, August 01, 2003 1:53 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Making platinum?


Level up to higher lvls say like in your 30's or higher and start camping
things to sell. You can even farm spider silks at your level which sell for
a decent amount of pp these days. Dont buy guides to platinum making and
all that, most of em are bogus.

Nakoor 63 mage on Solesk Ro
Officer of Sacred Honor
